full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME LHA'I BSANGS MCHOD DANG RA'I TSE THAR DANG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA, 'DIR MCHED 'GROGS AE MA CHI BKA' BCU DANG, NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYI SOG YUL 'DI GAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BA'I BKRA SHIS PA 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA'I BYIN BRLABS @015B SOGS MED PA'I SOGS YIG TSIG LHANG CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MDO, RANG 'DI LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR SBYIN BSREG GI THAB BSKYED DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA DE'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG KHUG CHEN PO'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STENG DU NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DANG, CHAD DANG MA nI RIL BU 'BUL SOGS NI, NOM CHI GU SHRI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SO, ,GA-YANG KHRAL DU DBANG PHYUG ZHES PA ME MO GLANG GI LO'I HOR ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES BZANG POR 'GRUB PA'O, ,)
